医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
国际足联和世界卫生组织联合发起脑震荡意识倡议根据全球运动战略目标：2023-2027 年，继 2024 年 3 月国际足联年度大会上宣布之后，国际足联正在与世界卫生组织（WHO）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/FIFA-and-WHO-unite-to-launch-a-concussion-awareness-initiative.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/FIFA-and-WHO-unite-to-launch-a-concussion-awareness-initiative.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f07230b-ab1d-4529-8f2e-67b67eaf846f Wed, 18 Sep 2024 12:20:17 -0400 FIFA and WHO unite to launch a concussion awareness initiative
MicroRNA 谱有助于评估林奇综合征携带者的癌症风险Tero Sievänen 在芬兰于韦斯屈莱大学完成的博士论文中证明，可以根据循环 microRNA 谱来评估林奇综合征携带者的癌症风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/MicroRNA-profiles-help-assess-cancer-risk-in-Lynch-syndrome-carriers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/MicroRNA-profiles-help-assess-cancer-risk-in-Lynch-syndrome-carriers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1e68ef31-cd74-4ebd-afa2-3265fdc6d6c1 Wed, 18 Sep 2024 12:16:33 -0400 MicroRNA profiles help assess cancer risk in Lynch syndrome carriers
接触苯乙烯和乙苯会增加患糖尿病的风险2 型糖尿病 (T2DM) 是一个重要的公共卫生问题，预计其患病率将在全球范围内急剧上升。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Exposure-to-苯乙烯-and-乙苯-elevates-diabetes-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Exposure-to-苯乙烯-and-乙苯-elevates-diabetes-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=651a469a-a688-460e-8025-46ca88c58414 Wed, 18 Sep 2024 12:12:40 -0400 Exposure to styrene and ethylbenzene elevates diabetes risk
研究表明金属接触会增加动脉粥样硬化的风险根据美国心脏病学会旗舰期刊《JACC》今天发表的一项研究，环境污染造成的金属暴露与冠状动脉钙积聚增加有关，其水平与吸烟和糖尿病等传统危险因素相当。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Study-links-metal-exposure-to-increased-risk-of-atherosclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Study-links-metal-exposure-to-increased-risk-of-atherosclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c1c14cf-1dcf-47ca-9b09-ad37f4a41197 Wed, 18 Sep 2024 12:04:26 -0400 Study links metal exposure to increased risk of atherosclerosis
临时血糖测试漏掉了大多数妊娠期糖尿病病例在筛查孕妇是否患有妊娠糖尿病时，随意的血糖检测会漏掉 70% 的病例。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Casual-blood-glucose-test-misses-majority-of-gestational-diabetes-cases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Casual-blood-glucose-test-misses-majority-of-gestational-diabetes-cases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4fae47f-9000-4bdc-a3b1-f8275abc2f13 Wed, 18 Sep 2024 11:58:21 -0400 Casual blood glucose test misses majority of gestational diabetes cases
高海拔与女性先天性心脏病增加有关根据在多米尼加共和国蓬塔卡纳举行的 2024 年 ACC 拉丁美洲大会上发表的一项新研究，居住在高海拔地区的女性的全球先天性心脏病患病率较高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/High-altitude-linked-to-increased-congenital-heart-disease-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/High-altitude-linked-to-increased-congenital-heart-disease-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=708f4480-0a05-4e6c-9d47-20d3c074cf4d Wed, 18 Sep 2024 11:51:15 -0400 High altitude linked to increased congenital heart disease in women
研究为彻底改变肌肉疾病的治疗铺平了道路1 型兰尼碱受体 (RyR1) 是骨骼肌中重要的钙释放通道，对于肌肉收缩至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Study-paves-way-for-revolutionizing-the-management-of-muscle-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Study-paves-way-for-revolutionizing-the-management-of-muscle-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20284f14-649c-4e7f-b75f-64f7d09e7682 Wed, 18 Sep 2024 10:44:49 -0400 Study paves way for revolutionizing the management of muscle disorders
新发现的机制可以通过促进胚胎植入彻底改变不孕症护理熊本大学的一个团队发现了一种新机制，可以通过促进胚胎植入彻底改变不孕症护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Newly-discovered-mechanism-could-revolutionize-infertility-care-by-promoting-embryo-implantation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Newly-discovered-mechanism-could-revolutionize-infertility-care-by-promoting-embryo-implantation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=826ecec9-66bf-404c-bc58-e3a68193226b Wed, 18 Sep 2024 10:39:05 -0400 Newly discovered mechanism could revolutionize infertility care by promoting embryo implantation
对儿科多发性硬化症的早期干预可以改善长期结果今天在 ECTRIMS 2024 上发表的新研究表明，在儿童时期开始单克隆抗体治疗，而不是将治疗推迟到成年早期，可以显着减少多发性硬化症 (MS) 患者的长期残疾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Early-intervention-in-pediatric-onset-MS-can-lead-to-improved-long-term-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Early-intervention-in-pediatric-onset-MS-can-lead-to-improved-long-term-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=965e4e6f-caf1-42c5-841f-ad241cc3bab7 Wed, 18 Sep 2024 10:35:17 -0400 Early intervention in pediatric-onset MS can lead to improved long-term outcomes
研究人员发现口腔癌细胞如何阻止人体的免疫反应麦考瑞大学的研究人员发现了有关口腔癌细胞如何阻止人体免疫反应的新信息。这可能会为这种侵袭性疾病提供更好的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Researchers-discover-how-oral-cancer-cells-may-block-the-bodys-immune-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Researchers-discover-how-oral-cancer-cells-may-block-the-bodys-immune-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84395c6b-0f4a-4bf5-a042-4d74b886c2c8 Wed, 18 Sep 2024 09:22:02 -0400 Researchers discover how oral cancer cells may block the body's immune response
